scripts.build: npm run update-meta && react-scripts build && cp public/.htaccess build/.htaccess && npm run create-packages
scripts.build-no-backup: npm run update-meta && react-scripts build && cp public/.htaccess build/.htaccess && npm run create-packages && mv build.zip build-packages/build.zip && minimal-updates.zip build-packages/minimal-updates.zip
scripts.create-packages: zip -r build.zip build/ && npm run create-minimal-update
scripts.create-minimal-update: mkdir -p minimal-update && cp build/index.html minimal-update/ && cp -r build/static minimal-update/ && cp build/update-endpoint.php minimal-update/ 2>/dev/null || true && cd minimal-update && zip -r ../minimal-update.zip . && cd .. && rm -rf minimal-update && echo 'âœ… Created packages:' && ls -lh build.zip minimal-update.zip
scripts.build-minimal-only: npm run update-meta && react-scripts build && npm run create-minimal-update
scripts.build-and-serve: npm run build && npm run serve-build
